content.text:
# List of cities and towns in the Czech Republic__disambig_2

This is a list of municipalities (obce) of the Czech Republic which have status of a city, town or market town granted by law. As of 2025, there are 27 cities, 583 towns and 232 market towns in the Czech Republic.
The population is shown in brackets and is current to 1 January 2025.

*Prague (1,397,880)
